data.title: Aggressive Support Paranoia For B Main
data.description: Coordinate a play with your teammates towards B Main, and adjust your blind according to the orb or an early aggressive fight deeper into main.

data.title: Retake and B Site Hold Smokes
data.description: You can use both smokes for both situations, as they'll act as perfect cover for your teammates to assist you in more favorable angles.

data.title: A Main Dark Cover One Way Hold
data.description: Use this easy and powerful smoke lineup to successfully pressure out Attackers towards A Main.
